titles.title: Acknowledging the achievements of the late Robert Condon and the Rolling Readers USA program he founded in advancing children's literacy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 3/23/1999--Introduced. Acknowledges the achievements of the late Robert Condon and the Rolling Readers USA program he founded in advancing children's literacy through volunteerism. Supports the goals and ideas of the national read-in day sponsored by Rolling Readers USA to commemorate Robert Condon's achievements.
